comments.text: Software Engineer and Full Stack Web Developer

sections.title: About Me
sections.text:
I am a competitive and passionate, mostly focused on Microsoft technologies and programming languages. My interests are mostly related to Cloud Computing, Code Security, Database Modelling and Application Development.
Currently I am a working as a Full Stack Web Developer in Turin. This is a job that I really enjoy since I am able to grow up as a developer every day, through my daily tasks.
When I receive positive feedback related to my job, I feel that this is the ultimate victory.
I really love to share my knowledge in technology, work with other people and being challenged every day.

subsections.title: Deltatre (Jan 2019 − Current) − Software Engineer Consultant
subsections.text:
I currently work as a Consultant (Full Stack web developer) in Deltatre, the largest global technology partner in sports in Italy.
In particular I work in the "FBS - Global Football Enterprise" team working on several projects, websites and applications for one of our biggest customers, UEFA (Union of European Football Associations).
Working with a large amount of different projects and teams is thrilling because I see every day some brand new technologies, methodologies, things to learn and a lot of challenges to face with.
Especially me and my team face everyday problems related to:

- concurrency
- large amount of data
- both client and server performance
- maintenance

Our main languages and technologies for the Front end part are developed using SPA frameworks such as Angular JS and Angular 7, while the backend part is developed in ASP.NET (.NET Core and .NET 4.6).
Some of our projects are hosted on Microsoft Azure, and my interest for this cloud platform is getting bigger everyday.
